welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hukou, Taiwan! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city known for its stunning natural scenery and vibrant culture. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Hukou has to offer.

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving most international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, mainly used by international airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but registration is required.
